channel.title: Issue with Compiler AND Codes. Please Help
channel.description:
Okay So I've only just started working on the server and I do have a lot to do to it but before i deal with them i need to get the compiler to work because I like to check how it looks after i apply/change things.
My problem is that when I try to load the compiler I get this issue:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/scyqrq.png[/img]
As you can see it has 1 Error which has something to do with the CombatAssist File. So after a little bit of mucking about, I managed to pinpoint the problem but not how to resolve it.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/esvij6.png[/img]
the screen shot i referred to in the above screenshot is below.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/244bixc.png[/img]
If you need any more info so that you can help me resolve this issue, Please let me know.
Apart form that Thanks in advance to anyone who may be of help to me with this situation.
The server i'm trying to run is a 317 server but i believe it has objects from a 508+ (Chaotic gear and whatnot)
[b]UPDATE[/b]
We got that error out of the way but now its got another error stating that there is 100 errors. i posted a copy of the errors in a post further down. i also have this screenshot if it helps.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/30xivee.png[/img]
Thank-you, AncientX I D E F I Chhriis

item.title: Issue with Compiler AND Codes. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @AncientX AncientX
item.description:
@AncientX wrote:

ok, well i tried looking at other 100 error resolve guides but they are not working,

I need a professional input on what to do.

I’ve made sure that i’ve set my variables correctly for JDK 6u21 so I’m reasonably sure that that cannot be the situation.

:S

Read full topic
item.source: Issue with Compiler AND Codes. Please Help

item.title: Issue with Compiler AND Codes. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

AncientX:

[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/30xivee.png[/img ]

Lol, that isn’t causing the error.

It’s caused by a missing bracket.

item.title: Issue with Compiler AND Codes. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @AncientX AncientX
item.description:
@AncientX wrote:

Okay So I’ve only just started working on the server and I do have a lot to do to it but before i deal with them i need to get the compiler to work because I like to check how it looks after i apply/change things.

My problem is that when I try to load the compiler I get this issue:

As you can see it has 1 Error which has something to do with the CombatAssist File.
So after a little bit of mucking about, I managed to pinpoint the problem but not how to resolve it.

the screen shot i referred to in the above screenshot is below.

If you need any more info so that you can help me resolve this issue, Please let me know.

Apart form that Thanks in advance to anyone who may be of help to me with this situation.

The server i’m trying to run is a 317 server but i believe it has objects from a 508+ (Chaotic gear and whatnot)

UPDATE

We got that error out of the way but now its got another error stating that there is 100 errors. i posted a copy of the errors in a post further down. i also have this screenshot if it helps.

30xivee.png943×326

Thank-you,
AncientX
I D E F I
Chhriis
